languages.text: "Потому недреманное око {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g} и называют недреманным. Я и во сне все слышу".

traits.locale_text: "Потому недреманное око Инквизиции и называют недреманным. Я и во сне все слышу".

languages.text: "That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."
languages.original_text: "Потому недреманное око {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g} и называют недреманным. Я и во сне все слышу".

traits.locale_text: "That is why they call the unsleeping eye of the Inquisition unsleeping. Even in my sleep, I hear everything."
"That is why they call the unsleeping eye of the Inquisition unsleeping. Even in my sleep, I hear everything."
"That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."
"That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."
"That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."

languages.text: 「それこそ{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}が眠らぬ目と呼ばれる由縁。眠っていようと、私は全てを聞いている」
languages.original_text: "That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."

traits.locale_text: 「それこそ{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}が眠らぬ目と呼ばれる由縁。眠っていようと、私は全てを聞いている」

languages.text: “所以人们才会称我们为{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的不眠之眼。即使是在睡梦中，我也能听到一切。”
languages.original_text: "That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."

traits.locale_text: “所以人们才会称我们为{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的不眠之眼。即使是在睡梦中，我也能听到一切。”

languages.text: «Por eso dicen que el ojo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} nunca duerme. Incluso en sueños, me entero de todo».
languages.original_text: "That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."

traits.locale_text: «Por eso dicen que el ojo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} nunca duerme. Incluso en sueños, me entero de todo».

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas pour rien que l'on dit que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} ne dort que d'un œil. Même dans mon sommeil, j'entends tout. »
languages.original_text: "That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas pour rien que l'on dit que l'Inquisition ne dort que d'un œil. Même dans mon sommeil, j'entends tout. »

languages.text: "Darum spricht man ja auch vom schlaflosen Auge der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Selbst im Schlaf höre ich alles."
languages.original_text: "That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."

traits.locale_text: "Darum spricht man ja auch vom schlaflosen Auge der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Selbst im Schlaf höre ich alles."

languages.text: "Ne demek. Boşuna {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon'un{/g} gözü her şeyi görür demiyorlar. Gözüm görmese kulağım duyar."
languages.original_text: "That is why they call it the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}. Even in sleep, I hear everything."

traits.locale_text: "Ne demek. Boşuna {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g}'un gözü her şeyi görür demiyorlar. Gözüm görmese, kulağım duyar.."
